desc: Memory Treasures is the only personalised memorial jewellery brand focusing specifically on support for the bereaved with hand-crafted, sterling silver keepsakes. Fingerprint jewellery, original handwriting and drawings, handprint jewellery and footprint jewellery. Making memories for hospitals, hospices and charities.

layout.text: All jewellery is handcrafted and hand engraved, rather than laser etched, using your loved one's unique prints or handwriting to create a lasting keepsake.
